string-array.name: desc_movie_eng
string-array.item: Star Wars beginning with the setting was thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the defeat of the Galactic Empire, portrayed in Episode VI - Return of the Jedi. The galaxy was still at war, pitting the New Republic (and its Resistance fighters and Starfighter pilots, led by Luke Skywalker is twin sister, General Leia Organa (Carrie Fisher), the ex-Princess) against the villainous forces of the First Order, successors of the Galactic Empire, fortified by Stormtroopers.

Deadly accident within Jurassic Park during the movement of a vicious creature - a velociraptor - from its heavily-fortified cage. The spectacular park was located on the secluded island of Isla Nublar 120 miles west off the coast of Costa Rica. Its wealthy entrepreneur and InGen Corporation CEO John Hammond (Richard Attenborough) faced a $20 million lawsuit unless the park was given an on-site inspection and all-clear before its imminent opening he needed outside opinions from reputable individuals "to sign off on the park.

Gotham City besieged by crime. A robbery of a high-rise office building is mob bank in Gotham City was being conducted by five clown-masked thieves (Grumpy, Chuckles, Happy, Bozo and Dopey) including their leader The Joker (Heath Ledger) with ghastly clown-makeup - who had masterminded the theft so that they would each kill each other - leaving him with all the shares. He told the downed bank manager

The film introduced the character of geeky, bespectacled Midtown HS senior Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire), who was at love from afar with his pretty, redheaded next door Queens, NY neighbor Mary Jane Watson (Kirsten Dunst), although she was the girlfriend of bullying jock Flash Thompson (Joe Manganiello). During a field trip with his class to Columbia University is Science Department where he served as photographer, Peter was bitten in the hand by a genetically-designed super-spider that had escaped from its enclosure

In the opening scene, costumed Deadpool Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) rode in the back of a NYC cab. After joining the Indian cabbie Dopinder (Karan Soni) in the front seat, he was told how Dopinder lost his girlfriend Gita to his more attractive male cousin. Deadpool described how it was Christmas Day and he was seeking revenge against a guy who had disfigured his face I have been waiting, 1 year, 3 weeks, 6 days and 14 minutes to make him fix what he did to me

Film Sherk The Third opened during a dinner performance in the Medieval Times Theatre, where Prince Charming (voice of Rupert Everett) was enacting on stage his rescue of Princess Fiona from the dragon-guarded castle tower on his valiant steed Chauncey. Many Fairytale characters were seated at a table in the audience. A man dressed in a bad ogre costume, to appear like Shrek, came on the stage. Things were not going well

Disguised, black-caped crusader Batman Michael Keaton confronting two robbers in a dark, deserted, crime-ridden Gotham City alleyway after they had assaulted a tourist couple with a young boy - he kicked one thug through a doorway, and menaced the other one - warning him to tell his criminal friends about their new adversary I want you to tell all your friends about me...I am Batman

In the dystopian year of 2023 in New York City, the world was being ravaged by constant war. Central Park had been turned into a prison camp with mutants under Sentinel guard. Mutants were being hunted and exterminated by the robotic Sentinels, and the remaining humans experimented upon them to exploit their abilities. Mutants were on the brink of extinction, and the entire human race was also threatened by the apocalyptic conditions.

During the summer between his second and third year at Hogwarts, witchcraft and magic student Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) was again living with the Dursleys: Uncle Vernon (Richard Griffiths) and Aunt Petunia (Fiona Shaw). He secretly practiced magic spells. During a visit when Uncle Vernon iss offensive sister Marge (Pam Ferris) insulted Harry is deceased parents and his own upbringing ("If there is something wrong with the bitch, then there s something wrong with the pup), he retaliated by inflating her into a floating balloon that sailed away.

A prologue to be reprised at the film is conclusion, about six months after the events of the first film. In a secure downtown building housing the city is electrical power re-routing facilities, a leather-clad, helmeted woman on a motorcycle crashed through its roof - she battled security guards and then announced by phone: Im in - meaning she had entered the illusory Matrix. She was revealed to be Trinity (Carrie-Anne Moss)

string-array.name: desc_tv
string-array.item: Money Flower (Hangul: 돈꽃 RR: Donkkot) is a 2017 South Korean television series starring Jang Hyuk and Park Se-young. The drama is scheduled to air every Saturday and Sunday at MBC starting November 11, 2017. [2] This drama tells the story of people who are driven by greed. Kang Pil-Joo (Jang Hyuk) grew up at an orphanage, but he now works as a managing director of a legal team at a corporation. He is acknowledged for his intelligence and his exemplary job performance. Some of those that work around him are jealous of him.

Knowing Bros (Korean: 아는 형님; RR: Aneun Hyeongnim) is a South Korean variety show, distributed by JTBC every Saturday. This show is classified as a reality television-variety show, where the MCs and guests gather in a classroom environment and discuss personal topics. Knowing Bros first aired on December 5, 2015.As of August 10, 2019, 192 episodes of Knowing Bros have been aired. In the past year the JTBC Ask Us Anything or Knowing Brother (KB) program has become a phenomenon in South Korea. Its popularity can even match phenomenal programs such as Infinity Challenge, 1 Day 2 Nights and Runningman

1 Night 2 Days (Hangul: 1 박 2 일; also known as 2 Days and 1 Night; abbreviated as 1N2D) is a variety-reality show aired on the KBS2 network. 1N2D is one of the segments on the Happy Sunday event. Until now, 1N2D has experienced several member changes and is now undergoing its third season. The current permanent members are Kim Jong-min, Cha Tae-hyun, Kim Joon-ho, Defconn, Yoon Shi-yoon, and Jung Joon-young. The concept of this event is Real wild road variety where members explore South Korea to recommend viewers to a number of interesting places in the country.

My Little Old Boy (a.k.a. Moms Diary: My Ugly Duckling; Korean: 미운 우리 새끼; RR: Miun Uri Saekki) is a South Korean television entertainment program, distributed and syndicated by SBS every Sunday at 21:05 (KST). This program features Korean celebrity hits that comment on the videos of their boys. Aiguu mom neolithic era

I Live Alone (Korean: 나 혼자 산다; RR: Na Honja Sanda), also known as Home Alone,[2] is a South Korean television entertainment program, distributed and syndicated by MBC every Friday at 23:00 (KST). This TV show 1 is slide, yup this program from MBC has a unique concept. The concept is to show someone daily routine that is displayed real without a script

Prison Playbook [2] (Hangul: 슬기로운 감빵 생활 RR: Seulgirowun Gamppangsaenghwallit. Wise Prison Life) is a forthcoming South Korean television series in 2017 directed by Shin Won-ho and starring Jung Kyung-ho and Park Hae-soo. This series marks Park Hae-soos first major role. This drama will be aired on tvN starting November 22, 2017 on Wednesday and Thursday at 21:30 (WSK).

The October 24th episode of JTBC "Ssulzun" featured guests such as Kim Soo Hyun, Moon Young Nam, Lim Sung Han, and Kim Eun Sook.In this broadcast, Kim Heechul said, (I asked writer Kim Eun Sook) about romantic comedy replication.He said, Kim Eun Sook responded with, It is true that is a romantic comedy clone. However, its not just something anyone can do. Only I can write things such as the foam kiss, and lines such as Lets go, baby ."He continued, "She also said, I started with replicating and developed it further. People who cannot develop cannot produce such works

tvN will be marking the beginning of 2018 with Youns Kitchen 2.tvNs Youns Kitchen 2, which is returning with a new season, will air its first episode in January of 2018. Youns Kitchen 2 will feature actors Yoon Yeo Jung, Lee Seo Jin, Jung Yoo Mi, and Park Seo Joon as they manage a Korean restaurant in a small village in Spain.“Youn’s Kitchen 2,” which has been confirmed to follow the end of “Encyclopedia of Useless Facts 2,” has also shared the differences from the first season.

Infinite Challenge (aka Muhan Dojeon; Hangul: 무한 도전 Hanja: 無限 挑戰; abbreviated as Mudo) is a Korean comedy television program, which is distributed and syndicated by MBC. As of January 2013, this event still had the largest market share for its broadcast time, between 13.8 percent and 19.7 percent of Korean television viewers watching Muhan Dojeon at 6:30 PM KST every Saturday night. [2] It also makes this event the leading free-to-air (non-cable) program for Saturday nights and is the most watched non-drama program (excluding special sporting events) in South Korea since November 2006 (with the exception of in January 2009, [3] April and May 2010 [4]).

Since the success of the Descendants of the Sun series, starring Song Joong Ki and Song Hye Kyo early last year, no South Korean drama has been able to break the 40 percent rating. The average drama from the State of Ginseng is only able to reap a dozen rating of up to 20 percent.But this year the highest drama rating has just been inscribed. The history is printed serials My Golden Life. The drama written by So Hyun Kyung successfully broke the rating to 37.9 percent.Although it hasnt reached 40 percent yet, the drama is stable with a rating of 35 percent. Two episodes of My Golden Life that just aired this weekend recorded an average rating of 35 percent, occupying the highest rating of all television broadcasts that aired on that day.
